title: Run for the Mountains
description: After a tragic incident on the football field, Caleb's hidden power is exposed with dire consequences. Meanwhile, on the other side of town, a sinister force has caught sight of his potential and seeks to capture him, sending Caleb and his family on a fight for their life. As Caleb uncovers his own abilities and what it all means, he travels across the sea to an unknown land to uncover his true purpose. But will Caleb's journey lead to his demise or be his ultimate awakening?
author: Jude Caze
